query:
UPDATE energy_campaigns
            SET
                campaign_name = $2,
                campaign_type = $3,
                status = $4,
                deadline_participation = $5,
                deadline_vote = $6,
                contract_start_date = $7,
                energy_types = $8,
                contract_duration_months = $9,
                contract_type = $10,
                total_participants = $11,
                total_kwh_electricity = $12,
                total_kwh_gas = $13,
                avg_kwh_per_unit = $14,
                selected_offer_id = $15,
                estimated_savings_pct = $16,
                updated_at = $17
            WHERE id = $1
